name: Febreze Air Mist, Air Freshener Spray, Odor Fighting Room Spray, Deodorizer for Home Bathroom Kitchen Office Apartment Dorm Room Classroom, Gain Original Scent, 8.1oz (Pack of 6)
short_description: FIGHTS ODORS: A household essential, Febreze Air Mist instantly restores any space with just-cleaned freshness
Breathe in the classic fresh fragrance of Gain Original Scent
FRESH FORMULA: Fights odors in the air and leaves behind scents you love
A FINE MIST: Febreze Air stays in the air for up to 6 hours of delightful scent
100% NATURAL PROPELLANT: Delivers whole-home freshness in every room, with an upgraded nozzle for full sprays to the last drop
HOME AND DORM ESSENTIAL: Your instant fix for odors in any room: the bathroom, kitchen, garage, and more
product_description: In even the cleanest homes, odors are inevitable… which can leave you and your household in a funk. Febreze Air Mist is your go-to room deodorizer for tackling those unwanted smells. Its new and improved formula is designed to instantly restore any space with the just-cleaned freshness you love. Now with 50% more odor fighters*, you can spray away stink confidently—whether you’re in the kitchen, bathroom, garage, living room, or any room where bad smells happen. And with 30% more fragrance*, you can breathe happy anywhere and everywhere in your home. This one’s for you, Gainiacs. Fight odors and treat your senses to the citrus-y freshness of Air Mist Gain Original Scent. Febreze Air Spray is made with a super-fine mist with particles that stay in the air up to 6 hours longer than before. This non-toxic air freshener has a 100% natural propellant air-freshening nozzle that delivers a consistent, full spray from the first to very last use, so nothing goes to waste. Next time pop-up odors bring you down, grab the odor-fighting power and long-lasting scent of Febreze Air Mist. (* vs. prior base Febreze)

name: Citrus Magic Odor Eliminator Air Freshener Spray for Home, Orange Blast, 3-Ounce, Pack of 3
short_description: ALL MAGIC. NO TRICKS. – Reach for a Citrus-Based Odor Eliminator Air Freshener that uses the power of Citrus oils to eliminate troublesome odors and sprinkle the air with freshness, without just water and aerosols
REVITALIZING SCENTS – The juicy freshness of our specially curated air freshener room spray will fill your home with the magical hues of “ahhh, that smells good"
SAFE INGREDIENTS – Our thoughtfully chosen, cruelty-free ingredients are pet-safe, kid-safe, and of course, super-busy-parent safe when used as directed
360DISPENSE – Our recyclable 360Dispense packaging technology provides continuous spray action in any direction without the use of propellants

YOUR NEW FAVORITE – Spritz the whimsical magic of clean to instantly liven your home and rest easy knowing our products are made without harsh chemicals like propellants, formaldehyde, parabens, and more!
product_description: Spritz the magical freshness and swirling, revitalizing scents of a Citrus Magic Spray Air Freshener to bring every nook and cranny of your home to life. Top off your cleaning routine, spray before a guest arrives, reminisce memories, or lift your mood with a burst of a Citrus-Based Spray made with pure citrus oils. With our 100% active ingredients you are getting a spray that is completely full of ingredients that work for you to eliminate odors without wasting money on water and aerosols. Our products are safe when used as directed, free from harsh chemicals like parabens, formaldehyde, phthalates, benzene, and more, and proud to be cruelty-free. Find your favorite scent to express yourself and spray your personality in the spaces you love! Some call it science. We call it magic.

name: Febreze Air Mist Air Freshener Spray, Odor-Fighting Room Spray, Air Fresheners for Home and Bathroom and Kitchen, Aerosol Can, Heavy Duty Crisp Clean Scent, 8.8oz, (Pack of 3)
short_description: 1. FIGHTS AIR ODORS: This room deodorizer fights air odors without just masking, leaving behind a light, fresh scent
2. EASY TO USE: Hold upright and spray in a sweeping motion throughout your house
3. VERSATILE USE: Spray every day in bathrooms, kitchens, offices, laundry rooms, and anywhere else you need a burst of ahhh-some
4. WHOLE-HOME FRESHNESS: Perfect for whole-home freshness with a 100% natural propellant
5. NATURAL PROPELLANT: Perfect for whole-home freshness with a 100% natural propellant
product_description: Odors. They're everywhere... lingering in the air or arising at the most awkward times. Forget masking them with some froo-froo spray; Febreze Air Effects actually fights air odors. This can of ahhh-some straight up fights stink with a neat little molecule called cyclodextrin (Bonus: It's naturally made from corn). It's a handy air freshener that's easy to use: Simply spray in a sweeping motion and fight those bad smells anywhere: the bathroom, the kitchen, that cabin you rented for the weekend, the shoe closet, your kids' room... anytime you want an instant burst of fresh. And because Febreze AIR uses 100% natural propellants, you can confidently freshen your home every day. Looking for even more ways to breathe happy with Febreze? Take the freshness on the road with CAR Vent Clips.

name: Muse Apothecary Home Ritual Active Odor Eliminator Spray - Furniture Deodorizer Spray & Bathroom Odor Eliminator for Home - Essential Oil Air Freshener - 4oz, Fresh Linen
short_description: Neutralize Odor with Aromatic Luxury — Transform your living space into an oasis of relaxation and comfort with this aromatherapeutic odor neutralizer spray infused with essential oils. Eliminate unpleasant smells caused by cooking, smoke, pets, or other common household odors, and replace them with this elegant room freshener scent. Evoke a sense of sophistication from the moment you step inside your house with this deodorizing essential oil spray

Multi-Purpose Household Use — Combat strong odors while gently scenting your home with this home and fabric odor eliminator spray. Apply this air freshener spray for bathroom, bedroom, kitchen and the rest of your home. Use it as a furniture spray deodorizer for fabric, carpets and upholstery to instantly neutralize unpleasant smells. Made in the USA with globally sourced components and cruelty-free, these long-lasting deodorizers for home are safe to use on any surface without leaving residue

Combat Smells with Proprietary Technology — Designed with our proprietary Muse Clear technology, this formula does more than just mask odors. It bonds with and neutralizes malodor molecules, rendering them permanently undetectable. Its reactive fragrant ingredients assist in the complete neutralization of odors without disturbing air quality. Tested by an independent laboratory against leading air freshener brands and proven more effective in malodor elimination

Set the Ambience for Revitalization — Relax in a light and airy atmosphere with the sophisticated aromatic effects of Fresh Linen essential oil room spray. Enjoy the delightful combination of floral and herbal notes, designed to evoke the scent of freshly laundered sheets. The room spray air freshener and deodorizer's blend of lavender, geranium, and jasmine creates a living space that not only looks beautiful, but also smells divine

An Inviting Living Space for All — Enhance the beauty and comfort of your residence with this home and bathroom spray odor eliminator. With just a few spritzes, this kitchen and bedroom spray creates an odor-free environment that is also beautifully fragranced. Elevate your cleaning ritual with this odor eliminating room spray, and entertain guests and host parties with confidence with the multi-purpose room deodorizer

name: Febreze Touch Fabric Spray, Air Freshener, Odor-Fighting Fabric Refresher, Couch and Linen Spray, Sneaker Balls Alternative, Ocean and Mountain Scent, Multicolor, 16.9oz, 2ct
short_description: 1. BURST OF FRESHNESS: Get a burst of freshness with every touch with Febreze Touch Fabric Spray, a must-have addition to your cleaning supplies

2. LUXE SCENTS: Waterlily, ginger, and hinoki mix together to create the can't-miss cool ambiance of Ocean. Mountain puts you on the trail to freshness with luxe scents of alpine, wildflower, and cedar
3. TOUCH-ACTIVATED TECHNOLOGY: Breakthrough touch-activated technology stores luxe home fragrance in your fabrics and helps fight odors, acting as a powerful room deodorizer
4. ELEVATED SCENTS: Bring elevated touchable scents to your chaise, throw pillows, and area rugs with this fabric spray
5. LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS: Gives fabrics long-lasting irresistible freshness, making it an essential part of your laundry beads scent booster and cleaning products collection
product_description: Get your hands on a new kind of scent experience: Febreze Touch Fabric Spray uses breakthrough touch-activated scent technology to store luxe scents right in your fabrics, giving you a burst of elevated freshness with every step, pat, and fluff. It’s home fragrance unlike any other. The scent activates with every touch: whether you’re walking on carpets, wrapping yourself with your favorite blankets, or simply lounging on the furniture. Make a statement with the carefully crafted scent of waterlily, ginger, and hinoki in mesmerizing Febreze Ocean. And experience a volcanic blend of mandarin and amber mixed with the fiery zest of lava in Febreze Ember. The long-lasting luxurious freshness continuously lingers... we dare you to resist sniffing every fabric. With Febreze Touch Fabric Refresher, you can transform your home into a luxurious, touchable scent sanctuary. ​

name: Poo-Pourri Before-You-Go Pocket Toilet Spray, Travel Essentials, 1 Fl Oz, Spring Variety 3 Pack, Each Up to 50 Uses, On-The-Go Bathroom Odor Deodorizer with Essential Oils, TSA Approved Size, 3 Scents
short_description: Instant Odor Deodorizer: Advanced Funk Lock Technology traps bathroom odors below the water surface before they escape. Spray 3-5 times before you go for a complete odor freshener that actually works. No more awkward exits or lingering smells

TSA-Approved Travel Convenience: Compact 1 fl oz travel minis fit seamlessly in your purse, carry-on, or pocket. Take confident bathroom breaks anywhere from office meetings to international flights or shared public restrooms

Professional Workplace Discretion: Ready for any stink situation, the slim, discreet bathroom deodorizer design allows confident use in shared office bathrooms and professional settings. Always leave the porcelain throne smelling better than you found it!

Fresh & Clean Formula: Poo Pourri spray is made with natural plant-based ingredients and essential oils. Leaping Bunny Certified and formulated without aerosols, parabens, or phthalates. No funky ingredients, because your health and the air matter

Easy-to-Use, Reliable Design: Equipped with a sleek new sprayer, the precision spray mechanism is tested for travel durability. The pocket size 3-pack variety ensures you're always prepared with citrus, hibiscus, and lavender scents

One Brand, All the Funk: The Pourri Promise means plant-based, stink-stopping sprays that actually work. Whether it’s your trash can, shoes, diaper pail, fabric, or your furry friend’s corner, there’s a Pourri for that. Just spray and go!
product_description: Poo~Pourri Before-You-Go Spring Toilet Spray Trio Whether you're hitting the road, heading to the office, or jet-setting off to paradise, the Poo~Pourri Variety Pack has your backside covered! This trio features three signature scents: Original Citrus, Lavender Vanilla, and Tropical Hibiscus, each in a 1 fl oz travel-sized bottle. Compact, but with big funk-fighting power, these plant-based sprays use Funk Lock Technology to trap odors beneath the water's surface, before they escape into the air. That means no awkward exits, and no lingering funk. The only thing you smell is a fresh burst of essential oils. Designed with travel in mind, each bottle is made of durable plastic, delivers up to 50 uses, and fits in bags, purses, or pockets. Equipped with a sleek new sprayer, the nozzle is easy to press, delivering a fine mist and an even spray pattern. Spritz before you go and leave any bathroom smelling like a tropical breeze, a floral dream, or zesty citrus sunshine. Suitable for commuters, travelers, partygoers, or anyone on the go, this trio makes a thoughtful gift. So go ahead, use it before you go, wherever you go. Because everyone deserves to leave the bathroom smelling better than they found it.
